item.title: DevOpsDays Amsterdam 2024 Recap
item.description: My background isn’t DevOps, but over the last year I’ve been working in Developer Experience. I attended DevOpsDays in Amsterdam, and felt slightly more “part of the community”. Thanks to the organizers for a great event! Day 1 - Workshops The first day of the conference was dedicated to hands-on workshops.
